sentences.sContent: We must instill a sense of duty in our children.
sentences.sContent_eng: We must instill a sense of duty in our children.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须在我们的孩子当中灌输一种责任感。

sentences.sContent: I aim to instill in them the pleasure of giving.
sentences.sContent_eng: I aim to instill in them the pleasure of giving.
sentences.sCn: 我的目的在于灌输给他们给予的乐趣。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + still(水滴) → 像水滴一样进入 → 逐渐灌输
